channel.title: [Minor-ish] Can turn pump without handle
channel.description:
Hey guys, just thought i'd report a bug in my opinion.
[img]https://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg210/scaled.php?server=210&filename=chrysanthemumy.jpg&res=landing[/img]
[img]https://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg513/scaled.php?server=513&filename=lighthousehy.jpg&res=landing[/img]
As you can see, the pump is on yet I have the handle in my hands. All I did was push E next to it.
It was on the level [b]BLAST PIT[/b]
It wouldn't let me give my co-ords or anything.
It's not a big deal as I was just pushing buttons but y'know, it's there!
Also, dont ask why I have 1hp, I haven't found a health thing in ages XD QUICK SAVE
It's just after the Big Fan when I go through the air duct, about 2 mins on from that, maybe less.
[EDIT]
I turned my head and saw a health thing! YOU GUYS DO CARE!
[img]https://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg833/scaled.php?server=833&filename=penguinsdj.jpg&res=landing[/img]

item.title: [Minor-ish] Can turn pump without handle
item.dc:creator: Wilky
item.description:
Hey guys, just thought i’d report a bug in my opinion.

As you can see, the pump is on yet I have the handle in my hands. All I did was push E next to it.

It was on the level BLAST PIT

It wouldn’t let me give my co-ords or anything.

It’s not a big deal as I was just pushing buttons but y’know, it’s there!

Also, dont ask why I have 1hp, I haven’t found a health thing in ages XD QUICK SAVE

It’s just after the Big Fan when I go through the air duct, about 2 mins on from that, maybe less.

[EDIT]

I turned my head and saw a health thing! YOU GUYS DO CARE!

Read full topic
